## CreateToolOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/ai/src/tools/common/index.ts" sourceLine="36" packageName="@commandkit/ai" />

Configuration options for creating an AI tool.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CreateToolOptions<T extends ToolParameterType, R = unknown> {
    name: string;
    description: string;
    parameters: T;
    execute: ToolExecuteFunction<T, R>;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### name

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The unique name identifier for the tool
### description

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

A human-readable description of what the tool does
### parameters

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`T`}   />

The parameter schema that defines the tool's input structure
### execute

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/ai/types/tool-execute-function#toolexecutefunction'>ToolExecuteFunction</a>&#60;T, R&#62;`}   />

The function that executes when the tool is called
